channel.title: War of the roses
channel.description:
http://www.paradoxplaza.com/games/war-of-the-roses
Multiplayer Medieval fighting/war game, in which you control just a lowly soldier, equipt with a sword, bow, crossbow or other weapons. Your goal is simple: kill all who stand in your path. I'd post the videos from the site but I'm on my phone.
Game is entering Beta soon, sign up for a chance at beta in the link above. If you wish to help me on my quest to beta, click the link below.
[Url=http://www.waroftherosesthegame.com/?ref=e6e9c36c518]http://www.waroftherosesthegame.com/?ref=e6e9c36c518[/url]
